alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:33PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Goshen County through 915 PM MDT... At 833 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Veteran, or 19 miles west of Torrington, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Veteran around 855 PM MDT. Yoder around 910 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
